Sentencas: The fastest and yet most prudent ways of changing the output power level of a solid oxide fuel cell power plant connected to the ac-grid are explored.
Titulo: Control of a solid oxide fuel cell power plant in a grid-connected system

Sentencas: The operating state of the fuel cell power plant is examined in term of the concept of feasible operating area of a cell.
Titulo: Control of a solid oxide fuel cell power plant in a grid-connected system

Sentencas: The utilization factor of the cell stack is maintained constant in steady-state by feeding natural gas to the fuel processor at a rate proportional to the current drawn from the stack.
Titulo: Control of a solid oxide fuel cell power plant in a grid-connected system

Sentencas: The fluctuations of the utilization factor in the transient state due to a change in operating power level can be constrained to the allowable range by strategically controlling the current drawn by the power conditioning unit.
Titulo: Control of a solid oxide fuel cell power plant in a grid-connected system

Sentencas: Based on measured variables and dynamic characteristics of the fuel processor, four strategies of controlling current are compared to arrive at the strategy that results in minimum transient time for a given power change.
Titulo: Control of a solid oxide fuel cell power plant in a grid-connected system

Sentencas: The proposed control schemes are verified through computer simulations.
Titulo: Control of a solid oxide fuel cell power plant in a grid-connected system
